name: Rabri Falooda Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Rabri Falooda Recipe: Milk 4 cup Pistachio (sliced) 6 -8 Khoya (grated) ½ cup Green Cardamom ½ tsp Sugar 2 tbsp Suree Rice Noodles 1cup Ice Cream (strawberry,vanilla) as required Rose Syrup 4 tbsp Tukh Malanga 2 -3 tbsp Ice (crushed) as required
instructions: Boil milk, add khoya and sugar simmer on low flame for about 45 min. Scraping the sides till quantity us reduced to almost melt Now mixture turns thick poruing consistency. Remove from fire add chopped pistaas and ilachi powder. To Serve: Take a tall glass put ½ cup rabri, top with crushed ice, rice noodles Ice cream pour about 2 tbsp of rose syrup and finish with tuk malanaga seeds stir gently to mix lightly, serve immediately.
